DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine 2-year recurrence-free survival patient minimal metastatic colorectal cancer hepatic resection treat adjuvant monoclonal antibody 3H1 anti-idiotype vaccine monoclonal antibody 11D10 anti-idiotype vaccine . Secondary - Determine toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Beginning 6-12 week curative hepatic resection , patient receive monoclonal antibody 3H1 anti-idiotype vaccine monoclonal antibody 11D10 anti-idiotype vaccine intracutaneously separate site day 1 , 15 , 29 , 45 , subcutaneously monthly 4 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 63 patient accrue study within 9 month .
